§ www

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**WWW** is an abbreviation for **world wide web** — which, nowadays, which is usually shortened to just //the web//.

The **www*** abbreviation is still seen in many [[internet-domain-name]]s for [[web-site]]s.
For example —

• ``www.reiver.link``
• ``www.yahoo.com``
